message: I propose a fair split, giving you 10% and me 90%.

I'll meet you halfway, but I think I deserve a bit more for my patience. This is my best offer so far.
We're both losing money with each round, so let's split it evenly and call it a day.

I'm not going to take 30%. I'll take the majority, but I'll give you a tiny share to save face.

I'll take everything. I'm not leaving with nothing. This is my final offer.
